intro: Discover the top budget-friendly hotels in Tokyo that offer both cleanliness and comfort for under $100.

hotels.name: HOTEL LiVEMAX Kayabacho
hotels.description: Discover the perfect blend of convenience and comfort at HOTEL LiVEMAX Kayabacho, situated in the vibrant Chuo Ward district of Tokyo. Enjoy air-conditioned rooms with private bathrooms, providing a relaxing retreat after exploring nearby attractions like Takao Inari Shrine and Koamicho Children's Park. Experience the best of Tokyo with a memorable stay at Do-C Gotanda.

hotels.name: Kuretake-Inn Tokyo Funabori
hotels.description: Kuretake-Inn Tokyo Funabori boasts a prime location just a two-minute stroll from Funabori Subway Station, making it easy to explore the city and visit Tokyo Disney Resort. Guests can unwind in cozy rooms equipped with flat-screen TVs and private bathrooms, while enjoying complimentary WiFi and convenient services like luggage storage and parking. The on-site restaurant offers a delightful selection of Korean, Japanese, and Western cuisines, ensuring a satisfying dining experience without the need to venture out.
hotels.highlight: Kuretake-Inn Tokyo Funabori offers cozy rooms with flat-screen TVs, private bathrooms, and complimentary WiFi, just steps from the subway.
